text: The Championnat du Cameroun de football is the top division football league in Cameroon. Since 2007 they are called the MTN Elite One for sponsorship reasons. == Clubs 2016 == *Aigle Royal Menoua (Dschang) *APEJES Academy (Yaoundé) *Bamboutos FC (Mbouda) *Botafogo FC (Douala) *Canon Yaoundé (Yaoundé) *Cosmos de Bafia (Bafia) *Coton Sport FC (Garoua) *Dragon Club (Yaoundé) *Eding Sport FC (Lekié) *Les Astres FC (Douala) *Lion Blessé (Fotouni) *New Star FC (Douala) *Panthère du Ndé (Bangangté) *RC Bafoussam (Bafoussam) *UMS de Loum (Njombé) *Union Douala (Douala) *Unisport FC (Bafang) *YOSA FC (Bamenda) == Champions == Champions were: *1960/61 : Oryx Douala *1961/62 : Caïman
